items.name: Art In Island
items.description: This museum has photo ops and 3D illustrations that let you interact with the art displayed in the museum. The Art In Island has opened doors for an interactive platform that lets you dwell into the art and take pictures with it, you can touch, interact, take photos and videos at this museum without anybody stopping you to. Become on with art and enjoy this experience at this full 3D museum.
items.location_hint: Art In Island, 175 15th Ave, Cubao, Quezon City, 1109 Metro Manila, Philippines
